駈ける: (かける) - to run (race, esp. horse)/to dash; to gallop (one's horse)/to canter; to advance (against one's enemy)
駈け出し: (かけだし) - novice/beginner; starting to run/running off/running away
駈け出す: (かけだす) - to run off; to break into a run; to start running
駈け落ち: (かけおち) - defeat and flight; disappearing without a trace; eloping
駈け足: (かけあし) - running fast/double time; (also 駈歩) cantering; doing things in a hurry
駈け込む: (かけこむ) - to rush in (at the last minute); to stampede
駈け降りる: (かけおりる) - to run down (stairs, etc.)
駈出す: (かけだす) - to run off; to break into a run; to start running
駈歩: (かけあし) - (sometimes trans. as gallop) canter (horse gait)
駈落ち: (かけおち) - defeat and flight; disappearing without a trace; eloping
駈足: (かけあし) - running fast/double time; (also 駈歩) cantering; doing things in a hurry
駈降りる: (かけおりる) - to run down (stairs, etc.)
駐まる: (とどまる) - to remain/to abide/to stay (in the one place); to be limited to/to be confined to
駐仏: (ちゅうふつ) - stationed in France; resident to France (e.g. of Ambassadors, etc.)
駐停車: (ちゅうていしゃ) - stopping or parking a vehicle
駐在: (chuuzai) - residence, stay, (job) posting, being stationed (no exterior, etc.)
駐在員: (ちゅうざいいん) - resident employee; local staff; representative of a local office; employee assigned to an office
駐在所: (ちゅうざいしょ) - police substation; residential police box
駐屯所: (ちゅうとんじょ) - military station; post
駐日大使: (ちゅうにちたいし) - ambassador to Japan
駐機場: (ちゅうきじょう) - aircraft parking apron
駐留: (ちゅうりゅう) - stationing (e.g. of troops); garrison
駐留軍: (ちゅうりゅうぐん) - stationed troops
駐留軍用地特別措置法: (ちゅうりゅうぐんようちとくべつそちほう) - Special Measures Law for USFJ Land Release/Special Measures Law for US Military Bases (in Okinawa)
駐留部隊: (ちゅうりゅうぶたい) - garrisoned forces
駐米: (ちゅうべい) - being stationed or resident in the USA
駐英: (ちゅうえい) - stationed or resident in the UK
駐車場: (ちゅうしゃじょう) - parking lot; parking place
駐車料金: (ちゅうしゃりょうきん) - parking fee
駐車監視員: (ちゅうしゃかんとくいん) - parking inspector; parking police
駐車禁止: (ちゅうしゃきんし) - No Parking
駐車違反: (ちゅうしゃいはん) - parking violation
駐輪場: (ちゅうりんじょう) - parking area for bicycles
駐輪所: (ちゅうりんじょ) - bicycle parking place
駒: (koma) - horse , piece (no shogi, xadrez, etc.); bridge (of a violin, etc.)
駒を動かす: (こまをうごかす) - to make a move; to move a piece (e.g. in shogi)
駒を進める: (こまをすすめる) - to advance to the next stage (e.g. in a tournament)
駒下駄: (こまげた) - low wooden clogs; komageta
駒場: (こまば) - pasture used for grazing horses (esp. ponies)
駒寄せ: (こまよせ) - small fence to keep out people and horses
駒板: (こまいた) - cutting guide board for noodles
駒繋: (コマツナギ) - Indigofera pseudotinctoria (species of legume)
駒繋ぎ: (コマツナギ) - Indigofera pseudotinctoria (species of legume)
駘蕩: (たいとう) - large and wide; peaceful and calm
駟も舌に及ばず: (しもしたにおよばず) - talking so fast that even a four-horse coach cannot catch up to the words
駭く: (おどろく) - to be surprised; to be astonished
駱駅: (らくえき) - constant stream of traffic; incessant traffic
駱駝炭: (らくだずみ) - charcoal burned in an earthen kiln
駱駝虫: (ラクダムシ) - inocelliid snakefly (any insect of family Inocelliidae)
駸々: (しんしん) - proceeding quickly/flying (of time)/rapidly/with great strides; (original meaning) running quickly (of a horse)
駸駸: (しんしん) - proceeding quickly/flying (of time)/rapidly/with great strides; (original meaning) running quickly (of a horse)
駿才: (しゅんさい) - prodigy; talented person; person of exceptional talent; genius
駿河問い: (するがどい) - Japanese bondage torture (hands and feet are behind the victim's back, and they are hanged from the ceiling with a rock on their back)
駿足: (しゅんそく) - fast runner; swift horse/fleet steed; (俊足 only) talented person/brilliant person
騎乗位: (きじょうい) - sexual position where the man lies flat on his back and the woman sits on top; cowgirl position
騎士修道会: (きししゅうどうかい) - military order
騎士団: (きしだん) - order of chivalry; chivalric order
騎士道物語: (きしどうものがたり) - romance (e.g. the Arthurian romances)
騎射: (きしゃ) - shooting on horseback; equestrian archery
騎射宮: (きしゃきゅう) - Sagittarius (9th zodiacal sign); the Archer
